study_plan_entry.title: Principles and Practicals in X-Ray Scattering

free_text.Learning outcomes: [br/]This course aims at introducing PhD students and junior scientists to the applications of modern diffraction equipment for the resolution of structural problems. Each topic will be introduced theoretically as a refresher of the basic concepts and then be put into practice on diffraction equipments. At the end of the course, each participant should be able to manipulate the equipments, treat the data and interpret their results with various software tools.

free_text.Keywords: X-ray diffraction, powders, crystal structures, high-resolution powder diffraction, diffuse scattering, neutron scattering, synchrotrons, phase transitions
